resources.string:
You are all set! You will receive notifications indicating when to connect and disconnect the charger. Feel free to exit the app. 

Please note that the app is designed to run automatically in the background, even after rebooting your phone. However, on certain devices, you may need to open the security settings and grant explicit permission for it to do so. 

Some devices terminate all background services when an app is removed from memory. If this applies to your device, you will need to 'lock' the app in memory to prevent this from happening. Also make sure that the app is excluded from battery optimization.

You are not set up yet! In order for the app to function properly, you need to grant it the necessary permissions. Please restart the app or go to your system settings and grant it notification permission.
